query:
SELECT cl.*, s.name as student_name 
FROM cardio_logs cl 
JOIN students s ON cl.student_id = s.id 
WHERE s.name LIKE '%Paulo%' OR s.name LIKE '%Bruno%'
ORDER BY cl.created_at DESC 
LIMIT 20

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3TwTEpp3aQwpk4j.26ab54900c35 --database SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM --execute SELECT cl.*, s.name as student_name
